alert.note: Alert for Allen; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 2:25PM EDT until March 23 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ALLEN AND NORTHEASTERN WELLS COUNTIES... At 224 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Fort Wayne to near Ossian to near Markle, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, New Haven, Ossian, Aboite, Middletown, Zanesville, Uniondale, Nine Mile, Yoder, Dunfee, Poe, Hessen Cassel, Wallen, Arcola and Rolling Hills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 13. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 296 and 313. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
